Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add complete CoachCRM SaaS application with RBAC and payment integration

This commit includes the full implementation of a professional multi-tenant Coaching CRM system with the following features:

## Core Features:
- âœ… Role-Based Access Control \(RBAC\) with 5 roles \(Owner, Admin, Manager, Coach, Support\)
- âœ… Plan-based feature restrictions \(Standard, Pro, Premium\)
- âœ… Razorpay payment integration with subscription management
- âœ… 7-day trial period with auto-charging
- âœ… Usage tracking and limit warnings
- âœ… WhatsApp integration support
- âœ… AI-powered features \(churn prediction, client insights\)
- âœ… Advanced analytics and reporting
- âœ… Team management and invitations
- âœ… Client management with real-time updates
- âœ… Session scheduling and tracking
- âœ… Payment processing and invoicing
- âœ… Responsive dashboard with sidebar navigation

## Technical Stack:
- Next.js 14.1.0 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Supabase \(PostgreSQL with RLS\)
- Razorpay for payments
- TailwindCSS for styling
- React components with hooks
- Server-side API routes
- Webhook handlers for payment automation

## New Additions in This Commit:
- Role selection during signup
- Feature restriction middleware
- Usage stats component on dashboard
- Plan-based feature gating for analytics, clients, and team members
- Upgrade prompts and limit warnings
- Complete payment workflow from signup to auto-charge

## Database:
- 11 migration files for complete schema
- RLS policies for security
- Triggers for automation
- Subscription and usage tracking tables

EOF
\)")
